NO_TAGS_CREATED: {{author}} You don't have any `Tags` yet. You can create them with the command `stc <TagName> <Emoji>`
TAG_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} You don't have any `Tag` with the name `{{tag}}`
NO_CARDS_CLAIMED: {{author}} You don't have any cards to tag
INVALID_CARD_CODE: {{author}} Invalid Card Code or No card Found
